itemInfo.itemDesc:
Pasta with quality seafood. 
- Unique effect: Casting Speed Rank +1 for 75min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Cooking Wine
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Squid
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Seafood Pasta, Stir Fried Seafood, Seafood Mushroom Salad, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Cooking Wine
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Garlic
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Steak, Steamed Fish, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Garlic Seeds in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.
